name: twitter
label: Twitter Username
description: The Twitter Username (no @) to link on the site template. Leave this empty to remove the Twitter link.

name: facebook
label: Facebook URL
description: The Facebook URL to link on the site template. Leave this empty to remove the Facebook link.

name: linkedin
label: LinkedIn URL
description: The LinkedIn URL to link on the site template. Leave this empty to remove the LinkedIn link.

name: youtube
label: YouTube URL
description: The YouTube URL to link on the site template.

name: featured_area
label: Featured Area
description: The Featured Area is the full row just below the rotator on the homepage. To populated it, add stories with the tag featured. To remove this area, change this setting to off.

name: logo
label: Logo
description: The logo image used for the theme. Supports .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files.
